website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering if you have a pet that you groom daily and aim to keep the coat looking fresh and tangle-free. But if you need to rake thick fur or challenging tangles, it may not work for you.
pros: Perfect for dog and cat owners who groom their pets frequently due to shedding, as it has close-set stainless steel teeth designed to grasp and remove loose hairs
cons: Doesn't glide through extremely thick coats very well
Hard to remove hairs from the teeth
Not the best choice for removing mats and tangles

customer_reviews.title: The only brush I'll ever use for my German Shepherd
customer_reviews.text: The only brush I'll ever use for my German Shepherd. I had a $60 Furminator brush that broke on me. I bought this for less than 1/4 of what I had paid for my Furminator, and it works every bit as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for shedding. LOTS of shedding.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely needs to be used gently but it takes A TON of fur off of Bubba (my Aussie). He hates being groomed but this really does the trick. The photo is of him agreeing. Right, Bubba?
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Widell

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool!
customer_reviews.text: We have only had this grooming brush a day but impressed how well it works. My wife used it on our short haired dog and you will see in the picture the pile of hair it removed in just minutes. Our dog enjoyed it too!
customer_reviews.author: stm0041

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS. I bought this with the hope that it would help get rid of my cats' hair build up. I've only used this comb 3 times in the last two days since I bought it. I saw the layers of hair the comb was getting out and thought it was working. After the third time, I noticed this bald spot on my cat's back that had never been there before. When I used a light to look closer, I saw the cuts from the comb and the bleeding it caused. I'm getting rid of this now because it is not safe for either of my cats!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Quiel

customer_reviews.title: Finally an affordable brush that works!
customer_reviews.text: I received this product today and it works like a charm. I have a Shiba Inu that blows it's coat twice a year and this helped out tremendously already. This has been the most effective comb I've purchased and it's a great price. The doge didn't seem to mind the combing either. I would recommend that you focus on brushing one area at a time and using very light pressure since it is a tad sharp and you don't want to hurt your pooch.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Smith

customer_reviews.title: Removes cat dander
customer_reviews.text: My Lily has the strangest fur. It mats every winter in specific spots. I have been using a great brush I bought at the vet's but thought I'd see what else would work. This is a de-shedder. It picked up the dander the larger brush was missing. I can brush the mats without hurting my cat. She loves this brush. Even my short haired Buddy likes it.
customer_reviews.author: NoName

customer_reviews.title: Essential if your dog sheds!
customer_reviews.text: The only negative with having a lab in your life is the shedding! It’s even more terrible during the transitional seasons (like right now, at the time this review is being written). After reading other reviews, I decided to upgrade to this brush. So glad I did! I found basically another dog’s worth of hair and could have kept going! Now her coat is shiny and feels much nicer than before. If you or a loved one has a dog that sheds profusely, you need this in your life!
customer_reviews.author: B.W.

customer_reviews.title: Happy kitty
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I was extremely skeptical about this product. But now I have to say I absolutely love. I've got two cats. One that would hide from me when she would see the cat brush and one that only let me get in about two strokes before she was done. Now though the one that would hide purs while I brush her and if I put it down she'll brush her face with it. My other cat doesn't mind it either she sleeps while I brush her. It takes off so much hair with little fuss! Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Shook

customer_reviews.title: Prompt delivery and a really great product. Since I've been using this brush
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery and a really great product. Since I've been using this brush, my cat now comes in my office every night and begs me to brush her. This is keeping her looking like she just had a bath. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: jeffrichter

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BRUSH! Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: ARE YOU KIDDING ME?!! This thing is great! Finally, a brush that actually gets my dog's hair up! (I attached pictures of the brushes that I've used that did not work at all along with a pic of this one) He's a short haired Jack Russell/Chihuahua mix & sheds like crazy! My condo is all tile & linoleum except the stairs & sweeping is a nightmare not to mention all the hair that collects on the carpet & our clothes! I'm hoping this brush will help reduce this problem & it looks like it will! It even helps get the hair up from my carpet!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica C.

customer_reviews.title: waste of time & money - it sucks
customer_reviews.text: This is the 5th 1 star review I am leaving for this incredibly crappy product because the company keeps deleting my legitimate review. LOL. This POS tool removes no shedding at all. Don't waste your time, The furminator actually does work, I would recommend that instead, it is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Megabit

customer_reviews.title: Both of my cats LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: I have only good things to say. I have a long-haired cat (maine coon) and a short-haired cat, and they both adore this brush. My big long-haired guy loves any kind of brush, so I wasn't so surprised that he immediately approved. But my short-haired girl usually gets over stimulated very quickly; so I am happily surprised that she loves it so much. In the case of both of them, I can brush for a reeeally long time and they don't bolt. They even love it on their bellies!! I have found that short, frequent strokes on the long-haired cat and long, gentle strokes on the short-haired seem to bring the best results. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: flour_girl

customer_reviews.title: Holy moly is works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush. I decided with winter coming quick that I'd buy a brush to clean up my old girl as she's been shedding like crazy lately. The photo I attached is after brushing for 20 minutes and isn't the final product I got after 40 minutes. I'm not sure how long this will last, but I definitely live it right now.
customer_reviews.author: Justina Logozzo

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: I just received the deshedding tool from Pet Neat today. I used it on my labradoodle who does lightly shed. I brush her at least once a week and this brush got an amazing amount of hair out. She looks and feels so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and this one is THE BEST! It seems like Annie even loves me brushing ...
customer_reviews.text: CORGI APPROVED!!!! This thing is a life saver!! I’ve used so many different types of brushes, and this one is THE BEST! It seems like Annie even loves me brushing her now. She would lay down and let me brush her without a problem! The brush is very gentle on her skin but takes off ALLLLLLL hairs!! I can’t believe how efficient this thing is!!!! BUY IT NOWNWONWOWNWO
customer_reviews.author: AnnieCorgi

customer_reviews.title: If you are purchasing this brush to reduce shedding on a long-haired animal I wouldn't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this grooming brush to remove fur from our long-haired cat before it was shed all over the house. The brush was completely ineffective. After purchasing and trying this brush I bought a Furminator brush. The Furminator was about four times the cost but worth every penny. If you are purchasing this brush to reduce shedding on a long-haired animal I wouldn't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Addessa

customer_reviews.title: Causes bald-spots on spine and/or shoulders!
customer_reviews.text: There needs to be a warning that depending on your pet’s undercoat, this brush can cause serious bald spots.
customer_reviews.author: Ames

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product!
customer_reviews.text: I used it today on one of my cats, and I couldn't believe the amount of hair that was released! My first thought was, "This was going to go onto my furniture and wood floors!" There was enough hair to make a hat! Lol. It works very gently on my cat; he just laid down on his side and literally started purring while I used the comb/brush on him. I am so pleased with it that I can't say enough good things about it.
customer_reviews.author: Teaching_Muzik

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use this on my long haired dachshund and my short haired chihuahua. It worked on neither of them. The competitor brand from the pet store works so much better and takes out so much more hair. My dogs hated this brush because it is so wide too. They would cringe every time I used it. One size does not fit most in this case. I relocated this brush straight to the trash can. Try the name brand and you can tell the difference immediately.
customer_reviews.author: RobinTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase I've made for my cats and I can't believe it has taken me so long to get one of these. This brush took so much fur off my cats and even off the chair they lay on all the time! So worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: My cat hates it, but it works very well
customer_reviews.text: This brush does an amazing job of removing dead hair from both the regular and undercoat. My cat absolutely hates it - I don't think it feels too good. It's important to hold the skin taut with one hand as you brush with the other hand, and to not brush too hard or too long in one spot. I do think using this brush too vigorously could be painful. I alternate brushing a few strokes with this brush, and then a few strokes with a soft rubber Grooma brush to kind of massage the area and make it feel better. I definitely can't do a full groom in one session with this brush, at least with my sensitive skinned cat.
customer_reviews.author: Bird That FlewTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: This thing is dope
customer_reviews.text: This thing is dope. We have a lovely lab/border collie named Morgan who's hair is so long the vacuum has issues with it . That being said, the first time I used the brush on him outside, I removed practically a pillowcase-full of hair, threw it in the trash or let it blow away in the wind for the birds to make nests out of. He's a lot cooler now for summer and there is exponentially less hair floating around. Win. Note: It is a lot firmer than many of our other brushes so it took him a while to get used to it. He loves it now.
customer_reviews.author: Winoellie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I really love this brush. I have a German Shepherd and we live in the south so she sheds all year long nonstop. This has literally cut my vacuuming each week in half. I would regularly have to vacuum my house once a day to keep up with the dog hair. I do it maybe 3-4 times a week now. It’s incredibly nice and has a good handle. Only downfall is you have to pick the hair off the brush. There is no ejector button for the hair like the other ones but for the price I’d take that set back anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As good as everyone says
customer_reviews.text: OH MY GOD. The reviews don't lie, this brush is amazing. I was browsing the best selling pet supplies on amazon (because why not?) and figured this would be a good replacement for our current CHI brush that needs to be cleaned constantly, and it's not easy to clean, either. I have a small shiba inu that sheds a ton, and there's a light layer of hair on everything I own. While he doesn't love being brushed with this brush, like some other pet owners have described, it does get a ton of hair out and is really easy to clean (probably the most important thing to me). It's also small and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Logan M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! My 4
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! My 4.5 lb chi mix sheds like a golden retriever! This helps sooo much. He hates it but it gets the job done! No more fur on my clothes!!!
customer_reviews.author: londyn pope

customer_reviews.title: Great de-shedding tool!
customer_reviews.text: Too late for my picture...sorry. I love this tool. I used immediately after it arrived based on the reviews and pictures from others. I love it!!! Our dog sheds so much that just petting him leaves hair him your hand. After one use of this tool, about 15 minutes worth, I can not only see the difference but I can pet my pooch and have a hair free hand when I am done. So happy!!! I will update with pics next week when I do it again. I will also be able to tell you if it made a difference in overall shedding. So far though...I am loving it.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing hair saver!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a hair saver! My German Shepherd sheds a lot sometimes, and every morning I wake up with hair throughout the apartment. Since I've used this on him, I've noticed less hair on the furniture and throughout the floor. It helps in removing the shedding top coat, for it to reveal the beautiful cost underneath. Worth ever penny! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Reyna Liebknecht

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is amazing. I have a horse coat sharpei and their hair is so thin and prickly. This brush got every loose hair and then some. I couldn't believe it. So many other brushes had failed me. My dog usually hates being brushed but she fell asleep while I was brushing her. 10 out of 10!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D.

customer_reviews.title: THE LAST BRUSH YOU WILL EVER BUY
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING. I have 3 dogs and 3 cats. I pull my weight of fur off my lips daily (on my Chapstick). I Wash and rewash clean blankets and clothes because of hair. After using this on all my animals I have 90% less air born and generally less fur covering me and my house. I can't believe I didn't find this sooner. Two cats have long hair. One dog with long hair and another with hair like a Shepard. I can actually play and rub them without a hand full of hair. Simply amazing.
customer_reviews.author: angel day

customer_reviews.title: Better than that other brand!
customer_reviews.text: I used to own the one that rhymes with terminator and I lost it during a move. This one does everything that one did but for half the price. I was a bit skeptical about the removable head when ordering, I really didn't see the point and still don't. I was worried that it might be wobbly or come off easily. Neither is an issue at all. This thing is solid! I also didn't realize until it arrived that it has a lifetime warranty, so if there ever is a problem I'm covered. I am extremely satisfied and both of my cats are shed free again.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL BRUSH!!!
customer_reviews.text: this is the 3rd brush I have ordered. the first one was for myself and the other 2 were gifts. this brush is great. I cannot believe how much hair it collects... even from our short-haired dog. our two cats aren’t overly thrilled by it, but it does get the hair out! our cats are spoiled rotten and getting them to do something that they do not want to do is a real challenge. this brush DOES exactly what it says it will do. I couldn’t be more pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: AngelHugs4JC

customer_reviews.title: It simply works 💁🏽‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: It works! I'm new to this and was fooled initially because it looked like nothing was coming out. I persisted and started cleaning the little I saw in the teeth which was simple. There was actually quite a bit more than I realized from Roscoe, a Pittie/Bulldog mix. I got a defurminator treatment at the groomer 2 weeks ago, so it may have had an effect on my results, but I'm still pleased that what I collected is now in the trash instead of my clothes, couch, etc.. I also registered my purchase for the lifetime guarantee (easy process), but I'm hoping I'll never need it.
customer_reviews.author: jojapeach1922

customer_reviews.title: Does not work at all.
customer_reviews.text: This does not work like ther furrminater. Worthless. You might as well throw your money away. Pulls the dogs top coat and does not get out the undercoat.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Golden
customer_reviews.text: This brush is doing wonders for my Golden Retriever's coat. After using the brush for a few days, removing huge bundles of hair even though I have kept him well combed out with other combs and brushes, his coat simply shines and when I brush him now, I get less loose hair from him. He appears to like this brush being used on him more than others. There have been no painful snags of matted hair with this brush. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Eclectic Reader

customer_reviews.title: Safe and easy shedding comb tool
customer_reviews.text: It has short trimmer teeth, I like the short teeth that won't poke or scratch my long haired Chihuahua dog, and it combs through his thick hair easily and I can wipe the dog fur off the shed comb easily. I am not sure what this shedding comb is really doing though, because it seems like it removes the loose undercoat hair off my dog, but then he sheds afterwards more than ever, Is this comb cutting the hairs like thinning shears and leaving the cut hairs? Am I supposed to do additional brushing and combing afterwards? Maybe someone can explain this to me. I have not tried to use it a second time.
customer_reviews.author: Iris M.

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown in purchase photo.
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely not the product in the advertising picture, it’s about half the size. Not happy. I have a German Shepherd. This will not make grooming easier. I will add photo before I return. It seems like others got what I was expecting but I definitely did not receive the wide comb. I looked back at my order several times to make sure I didn’t order incorrectly.
customer_reviews.author: a.riddles

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg this is the BEST brush/ comb ever!!! I’ve bought many brushes for my Min pin/Pom mix. She recently started shedding a lot. I thought because she was a shorthaired dog that she wouldn’t shed as much but I was wrong. This brush collects so much hair every time I use it, it’s amazing!! I brush her for about 5 minutes every other day. And I’ve noticed a great difference in how much she sheds. If I forget to do it for a couple days she sheds a lot again, so consistency is key!! I am so happy with this purchase and won’t ever use anything but this one ever again. I 1,000,000% RECOMMEND!!!!
customer_reviews.author: AngelaTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Pet brush
customer_reviews.text: My lab has soft fluffy fur and sheds like crazy! As fine as the teeth are on this tool, it seems to pull out the loose undercoat nicely. She doesn't seem to mind it either. The other brush I was using must have too harsh as it irritated her skin or maybe I was brushing too hard. It's narrower than I thought it would be but that's on me for not paying attention to descriptions. I should definitely be able to catch up on my brushing now. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great grooming tool but has NOT diminished shedding!
customer_reviews.text: I have a short hair chocolate Miniature Dachshund. He sheds like nothing I have ever seen before. I am sure the humidity and Texas heat make it worse. I use this in the bathtub after he has had a bath. OMG! I have never seen so much hair come off of such a small animal! I would like to say that he is shedding less everywhere else after using this tool, but it would NOT be honest! After I have used it for 3 months or so, I will see if it gets any better.
customer_reviews.author: jmthiessenrn

customer_reviews.title: It does its intended job!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve owned this brush for about 3 years. We use it every day, once a day. It is the best! It has helped with reducing shedding and hair all over our home. It removes our dog loose hair without causing him any pain or discomfort... How do we know? Our dog loves this brush. We just have to grab the brush and he leans and gets ready to be massaged with this awesome pet hair remover. I’ve recommended this pet brush to many friends and family dog owners. They are very happy with it and you will be too. Great quality, long lasting. After three years is still in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: No real effective for short haor dogs.
customer_reviews.text: My sweet little short hair pup leave her "love sprinkles" all over our house and us. I have been trying to find a brush for short hair dogs like her to help reduce the amount of hair everywhere. Unfortunately the seach continues. While this did remove some hair, there was plenty of sheading fur left behind. I spent 10 minutes with this product grooming, then 10 mintues after that with the silicone brush and got quite a bit more. After 20 minutes brushing her, I started petting her and loose hair was still flying everywhere! I have also tried shampoos that claim to reduce shedding, but that hasn't shown any marked improvement either.
customer_reviews.author: Becky_821

customer_reviews.title: Great Sturdy Brush
customer_reviews.text: This dog brush does as advertised. It cut my dog's shedding mess by, at least, half. The true test was when I gave her a bath. Those was a lot less fur trapped on the drain screen. It is much heavier then I anticipated so I do not have apply any pressure when I brush my beagle's short hair. The comb is super easy to clean unlike all the brushes I have used over the years. I highly recommend this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Fritchman

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs that shed!
customer_reviews.text: I adopted a dog this year. I’ve never had a dog that sheds. This guy sheds and sheds and sheds... I was at my wit’s end during spring shedding season. This brush is awesome. It removes a ton of hair from my my little guy and it is easy to remove the hair. We use it daily now - the pup sits on the footstool for his daily brushing as soon as he sees me grab it.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: If there's one thing I dislike about having pets is there fur everywhere! The first time I brushed my dog for about five minutes and I was pulling fur off her. I took all the hair off the brush a few times during this session. It's easy to use and it didn't seem to bother my pooch. I figured it will take about 15-20 minutes to completely remove all the loose fur. To maintain the shedding will probably require a 5-10 minute sessions a couple of times a few.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Dogs love it! Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: First brushing after a bath and you can see the pile. This was only half as the rest blew away while brushing. It works great. It’s good quality. And my dogs love it. At first they were hesitant but after brushing for a while they seem to enjoy it it’s gentle. Even works when fur is damp. Hair wipes right out since the teeth are shallow which is lovely when your brushing for an hour at a time. Blue heeler and Belgian malinios is what I have so shedding is big in spring time. If this thing ever breaks I’ll be buying another!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great at deshedding! Great Dan Lab mix
customer_reviews.text: Great deshedding brush We have a 95 lb Black Great Dane lab and his seasonal coat is chocolate brown. I just opened this package and brushed our dog and almost his entire seasonal coat came up with ease. Looking forward to only needed to vacuum once a day instead of two because of the crazy shedding! Only note is that if your pet has thick or a lot of hair - you may need to clean the comb off with every stroke, but that’s pretty normal with some types of animal hair (Hand and 24 oz bottle to show scale on massive amount of hair that came off my dog in less than 10 minutes of brushing)
customer_reviews.author: e. v. partido

customer_reviews.title: This really is self cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the "cleans itself" design but I thought I would give it a shot out of curiosity. What a fantastic product this is . I have a boxer with a very short coat and the amount of hair it took off him was amazing. The first thing I thought about was that all that hair would've eventually ended up in my house. As for the self cleaning, this is a simple but effective design; open up the trash can, push the button and "voila", a clean brush. This is one of those inventions that causes you to say to yourself "why didn't I think of that."
customer_reviews.author: Rockysdoghouse

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: I was so looking forward to a great shedding tool, but was disappointed in this product and will be returning it. If it helps to know, I used it on my Lab who I brush almost daily. Bottom line, it was simply not worth the money. I have an old dog brush where a third of the sharp, little wire bristles had already fallen out over the last 6 years; in this condition it removed the same amount of hair and was easier to do so, than this shedding tool. To clarify, my old "brush", which was much less expensive, was the "slicker" type with the compact, small, thin wire "bristles" that are sharp and slightly angled at the top.
customer_reviews.author: JBF

customer_reviews.title: Works great and the dog loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My mom was paranoid about using a metal brush/comb on her short-haired border collie. She thought she'd scratch his skin. But she LOVES this brush because the dog loves it too! It pulls lots of loose hair out, and even scrapes it off the carpet! When the brush comes out, the dog comes out too (he is fearful and hides a lot). This is a good bonding tool too.
customer_reviews.author: StarShopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use, Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have bought (and if anyone knows where my other one went . . .) because it really works. My Jack Russell is a shedding machine -- everything I own is covered with short white hair. He has sensitive skin and doesn't like to be brushed, but this one doesn't bother him. The brush fills up quickly. I just pull the wad of hair out with my hand, drop it in a plastic trash bag, and keep going. On nice days, we do this outside and let the hair recycle itself back into the universe. If I misplace this brush, I will definitely buy it yet again.
customer_reviews.author: Boxplayer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: So far this is working great. It took me a second to get the hang of it but once I did.. I was shocked at what I saw. My dog is a pointer mix so his hair is short, but boy did it clean out all those loose hairs and even got some of his dander. I’ll definitely be sitting with my pup at lease once a month to do this. Bonus... he absolutely loves it. I think he feels like he’s getting a message!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Williams

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this -- they come when they hear the "click" of the brush opening!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a couple of years ago and mine has held up just perfectly; I use it almost every day on both of my short hair cats. They just love it! It is so easy to use this brush and the click sound the brush makes when you push in the button (so the bristles pop out) has trained my cats to come running when they hear that sound! They know they will soon be enjoying one of their favorite pampering sessions. My cats still have fur balls at times, but not as much as before buying this brush. I highly recommend this brush; don't hesitate to buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: K. Stirn

customer_reviews.title: Best Grooming Product for our Tibetan Terriers
customer_reviews.text: Over the past several years we have purchased multiple products on Amazon to help us groom our Tibetan Terriers who have coats of both fur and hair. Some products work but the dogs didn't like because they hurt and others that didn't mind, but they didn't take off a lot of hair and fur. This is the first product that not only works really well, but the dog actually lets us brush him. Highly recommend this grooming brush
customer_reviews.author: AZguy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pet fur controller
customer_reviews.text: This brush works wonders for our Minpin dog as well as our two medium-long haired cats. All three were suffering with the summer heat and we were finding pet fur throughout the house. Within a short time the excess fur has been all but eliminated. All three pets love being brushed. Care should be taken just to let the weight of the brush rather than trying to push it into the fur, as we've been used to with other products. This brush takes care of everything with almost no effort.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Kachelmyer

customer_reviews.title: Best money ever spent!
customer_reviews.text: I am shocked & surprised at how well this comb works! I have a short-haired cat that sheds so bad that I can hardly stand to pet her this time of year. After combing her just a few times her shedding was truly reduced by 95%!!! No lie! If you have a shedder you NEED this comb!! Edit: because this brush works so well my Wiley girls' dander has been reduced by 98% Months in...summer shedding commenced and still the best money I ever spent!!!
customer_reviews.author: QueenBee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I received my grooming brush in the mail today. I used it immediately. I have a husky who sheds an enormous amount of hair all the time. I have used many different brushes on him. Most recently we have been using a U shaped curry comb (the kind used on horses) which has been somewhat effective. Regardless, I was still brushing him every day and each day he would lose so much hair I could make a small dog out of it. I spent about 5 minutes brushing him today, with this comb, and there was so much hair that my husband said it looked like a rabbit had exploded in our driveway. Anyway, great comb and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Young

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brush for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Do not overspend on expensive brushes at Petsmart or other pet stores. This brush does the job very effective, our German Shepherd sheds and we brush him with this brush twice a week and it has reduced shedding in the house by a lot. Of course we still have some hair in the house afterall he is still a German Shepherd dog but not as bad as it would be if we didn't comb him with this brush!! I recommend this brush to everyone who has a dog that sheds a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Yanelis

customer_reviews.title: Best on undercoat of longer haired breeds but any coat needs help at times!
customer_reviews.text: This is incredible for the hairier breeds. I have had 6 dogs and the 1 with a thick undercoat can not go without this type of brush for very long. The short haired Weim hates it but he has NO undercoat and sensitive skin. The only time I use it on him is when I can't find the tick comb. The amount of long white fur that this brush grabs is absurd. EVERY time, and by that I mean every day, the amount is mind boggling. He looks so sleek when he's done being groomed and he knows it! I am looking at the rest of the PET NEAT line before leaving the site!
customer_reviews.author: Jillsky55

customer_reviews.title: Great lower priced shedding control!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how much this product lessened the dogs shedding. As a lower priced item, than the big name product, I was not sure about the claims. But wow! Now when petting my dog, the puff of hair has disappeared! No more piles of fur around. My dog is short haired but really sheds. I had to vacuum twice a week! I was Leary of cutting my pet, using this sharp product. But not aggressively using, but still using it as directed, it really worked and the dog loves it! Cannot wait to use on the hairy cats!
customer_reviews.author: susan staples

customer_reviews.title: Furry friend
customer_reviews.text: I got this brush awhile ago and I can't say enough good things about this brush. The amount of fur it removes from my very hairy furry friend is astounding. If I didn't have this handy little tool, all that fur would be on my floors and fur furniture. I recommend doing the grooming outside, if possible because there will be a lot of fur flying around because thats how good this handy little tool is. My dog always seems happier after a good brushing with this tool, it removes all that excess fur and it also removes light matting.
customer_reviews.author: lookin4ginagirl

customer_reviews.title: Fur begone is what they shoulda called it.
customer_reviews.text: I have a German Shepherd and her job is to leave huge clumps of she'd fur all over my house. I wanted to buy that really expensive brush,but saw this one and for the price figured if it was terrible I wasn't out much. As it turns out, it isn't terrible! In fact, it works great. It's amazing how much fur this dog has, and she doesn't hate when I use it in her, which is good, because 100lbs of unhappy shepherd is hard to control. The fur releases easy so I can get more done with no frustration. Pretty great product. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sangiovese

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: The brush is super effective at getting any and all fur. I use this on my short haired & long haired pets. Two of my cats LOVE it and will come running when they see my pick up the brush. The other two cats are curious, but a little hesitant. This comes down to pet personality, nothing negative about the brush. It did wonders on fur knots and got out knots that I typically would cut out with scissors. Also, lifetime warranty!
customer_reviews.author: Kay Mac

customer_reviews.title: Significantly reduces shedding
customer_reviews.text: We've always had dark-haired dogs and had no idea what craziness was in store when we got a blondish Pit/Lab mix. Coming from a shelter, his diet was inconsistent, he spent most of the day in a concrete crate and he shed. so. much. I purchased this brush along with some vitamins and quality food and it has decreased dramatically. He enjoys being brushed. I do use it outside in case hair starts to fly (and it does), but for the most part, it's simple to use. The head is easy to clean and I usually wipe it down with a damp cloth afterwards and leave it out to dry. Has helped a lot!
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: The tiny teeth of Pet Brush (which is a comb) do not grab much hair, and you have to constantly remove that small amount of hair from its teeth. The shape of the brush/comb did not work well in many areas of my dog's body. The Pet Brush didn't work nearly as well as the two brushes I have already--one which is like a comb with teeth of two different lengths, and the other which is a slightly curved square surface with a lot of thin, bent "teeth". One of my dogs is a Shepherd mix who needs A LOT of brushing.
customer_reviews.author: Khary

customer_reviews.title: DEFINITELY Recommend. GSD & cat
customer_reviews.text: This works amazing, and is a great price. We have a German shepherd, a cat with thick hair (not long, but coarse), and a cat with short, soft fur. This works great for all of them, better than other brushes I’ve used, including the horse curry comb the Shepherd’s breeder suggested. One of my cats hated being brushed with every brush we have tried, but purrs when we use this. The dog chewed up part of the handle, but it still works fine, and even if I did replace it I would rather replace at this price than a Furminator. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Umphreys

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this brush almost 2 years ago. It was the first time purchasing this type of a brush, and was worried it would not work as well as the other types, but was pleasantly surprised. This brush does a great job getting the loose hairs, and cleans up my dog's coat nicely. The size is perfect for my medium sized dog, and has a very comfortable grip. Overall I am very happy with this brush and while this will last a long time, if I ever need another one, I will definitely purchase this one.
customer_reviews.author: ECH

customer_reviews.title: Picks up a lot of loose hair and my dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my boxer's short hair! It's not sharp but it will scratch your dog's skin if you brush over the same spot too many times or push too hard. You don't need any pressure to pick up the loose fur in their coat. My dog liked the "pets" that she gets from the burshing motion so we for once didn't have to hold her down at all. Woohoo! I do wish that there was a comb or something to push the hair out of the teeth of the brush. I have a hard time getting all of the hair out.
customer_reviews.author: Catie Stearns

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely delivers in its promise to get extra hair off your pup. I have an Australian Shepherd/Cattle Dog mix and she has a pretty thick coat. Now that spring is here and she's shedding her winter coat, I've been using this almost 3 or 4 times a week and getting amazing results. My *only* complaint is getting the hair off the brush once you've combed through. I wish there was a button release like some more expensive models I've seen, but for this price I can't complain too much.
customer_reviews.author: good work

customer_reviews.title: Not that helpful
customer_reviews.text: I watched some videos of groomers online before purchasing this product. Looked good so I ordered. I have a border collie and a chi short hair. Compared to the two other brushes I use to brush their coats, this one just doesn't do much for me. The quality of the brush is excellent, it just doesn't work well for my dogs. Considering returning it, even though nothing is wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen T Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Great for de-shedding
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow...this thing is amazing! We have a golden retriever and this helps get the loose hair from his undercoat during all seasons, but especially during his shedding seasons. Go gently though, you can tell when I press too hard or don’t use it gently enough. He makes it known that it is uncomfortable. But I slow down and release my pressure and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: Professional Brush for Keeping Your Pets Well Groomed
customer_reviews.text: We are a feline animal shelter with many long and short haired cats. We own a few of these brushes because they work so well. They are easy to use, and they remove excess fur quickly. The cats really enjoy being brushed with them, and we use them daily. If you want a great brush at a reasonable cost, this is the brush for you. Chances are you will want to have more than one to keep at different locations in your home to keep your pet looking good and your home fur free. We highly recommend this brush.
customer_reviews.author: CoFCC, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Great for short haired and long haired dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have a short haired Boston terrier mix who has been shedding like crazy lately but no brush can grab his short hair. This brush work GREAT for getting his undercoat and makes his coat so soft and shiny! I have also noticed that it helps a lot with his dry skin leaving so much less dander on his fur! I convinced my mom that she also needed one for her golden doodle and this thing takes off a small dogs worth of hair from him every time she brushes him out. This brush is truly magical for long and short haired dogs alike!
customer_reviews.author: Emilie P

customer_reviews.title: Works but irritates dogs skin
customer_reviews.text: I have an Australian shepherd/cattle dog mix and she loves to get brushed. We brush for a long time every day but she still sheds a ton. I have no idea how these reviews got 2nd dogs and cats out of theirs because after about 5 min my dog started acting like it was hurting her. We did get a lot of hair off and it seemed to be the deep down hair but we are just going to have to do it a couple minutes a day I guess. For $8 it's the best dog brush you can get
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: not so great on Persians
customer_reviews.text: The tool itself is easy to hold and clean, but I didn't get any more fur off with this comb than my cats' usual "regular" brush. They both sat still while I used this comb. I have a shorthair who enjoyed the extra attention, and I actually got more fur off of her than my Persian (who was the real reason for this purchase). My cottony Persian tolerated it somewhat, but it pulled his fur way too much, and I got a lot less fur on the comb than I do with the typical pet store brush. I will continue to use this on both in hopes that it prevents matting on my Persian's fur, but I'm not too optimistic!
customer_reviews.author: J. Patt

customer_reviews.title: HUSKY APPROVED!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING PRODUCT FOR HUSKIES! I am so proud I found this product! We have bought 4 or 5 different “deshedders”, for our husky and they have all failed miserably. They were either too rough on his skin and our dog wouldn’t let us get near him with it or they just simply didn’t get the hair out like we needed. But this product is outstanding! It’s not too rough and it really gets the hair out! He looks like a completely different dog now with all that loose hair gone! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Breeze Durham

customer_reviews.title: Great for preventing shedding
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was well thought that it was easy to remove the product without scissors. The size is perfect for my hands and was easy to manage while combing my dog. The teeth of the comb was covered with a hard plastic that keeps it from getting blunt or bent. I tried it for the first time and it took care of both the overcoat and undercoat of my dog’s fur making it look shiny and smooth. My dog doesn’t seem to be bothered by the combing process, if anything he got a little tickled by it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Panes

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: I show dogs and this is a great brush for removing loose hair and thinning the undercoat. My mom tried it on her Maine Coon cat who has long hair, but didn’t think it was right for his type of coat. I don’t want to use it on my Bengal cat because of her short, smoothe coat, as it is somewhat sharp. The sharpness (it’s really like a long clipper blade) is why it works so well on the dogs (Bulldogs). I would recommend this as a great stripper brush.
customer_reviews.author: smrose2005

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well on short(ish) hair
customer_reviews.text: I have a 85lb mutt that has some White Shepard which are notorious shedders. Ever since i have been using this tool its less and less hair around the house! That's how I know it works because I sweep every few days and normally horrified by the amount of hair I pick up. I am thinking if I keep up after the groomer it should be even better. He doesn't mind it at all, he would run away from the rubber brushes that I had so for whatever reason, he likes it. Not too mention the price!
customer_reviews.author: tlv15

customer_reviews.title: The brush I've been waiting for
customer_reviews.text: I have two short haired dogs and one long haired cat that shed like crazy and cause me to sweep every 12 hours (or it feels like). We have tried numerous brushes that never really made a huge impact on the amount of shedding. As soon as we opened this brush we tried it on our cat and the results were insane. I didn't even know I could get that much hair out of my cat! Since we have used it on him regularly the amount of hair he sheds has diminished greatly. It works just as well with our two dogs - a small puppy worth every time! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JAK85

customer_reviews.title: Best dog brush ever.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I have a lab and a shepherd. I just ordered a second one so we can do both dogs at the same time. I was apprehensive about it being sharp because of some of the reviews comparing it to a torture device. However, my lab is a giant baby about brushes, hates prickly wires etc. and she loves being brushed with this. It definately does the best job of any brush I’ve had at getting all the loose hair out. I’m enjoying petting my dog without a pound of hair flying around the air with every stroke!
customer_reviews.author: trina1999

customer_reviews.title: BEST INVESTMENT
customer_reviews.text: I have a border collie aussie. She's a sweet girl but oh my goooooooooossh - so much hair! I used this brush as soon as I got it in the mail. I basically made a second dog with how much hair I brushed off of her. I am never going to buy another brush and if I do, it's going to be this one. I have a short hair black manx as well, he's not keen on brushing for long periods but it worked wonders for as long as I could use it. If you're not sure, don't be. It's a great tool for long and short hair. And finally no more tumble hairs in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Scism

customer_reviews.title: Not Great for Large Long-Haired Dogs
customer_reviews.text: I recently adopted a beautiful 80-pound shepherd/collie blend, and she has turned out to be an absolute monster shedder. So I decided to stock up here on a variety of brushes. This one has a high quality build and is seemingly effective, but I just can't collect that much fur with it -- its blade is very small and it clogs almost immediately. I think for a smaller or less furry breed this might work quite well. This is not a bad product, but is certainly not adequate for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Adam MachanicTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if it's the size or the look of it but it terrifies one of my cats. If she sees me approaching with it in my hand she bolts before I get there. However, on the cat who would let me use it, it did a tremendous job at removing excess cat hair from her coat and left her silky and smooth. Easy, and didn't seem to tug or pull in anyway to cause the cat discomfort so it's a great tool.
customer_reviews.author: Alithea

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for my Aussies
customer_reviews.text: I found that this really pulled out undercoat and dead fur. I had a 12 inch ball of fur from one dog and his fur was so soft and looked much healthier. I also think he was MUCH cooler in our California heat as he got up and ran around the yard when I was finished with him. The second time I used it both dogs were pushing and shoving to be the first one to be brushed. It is really worthwhile. I'm going to buy another so I can do one dog while my husband does the other.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Does A Great Job
customer_reviews.text: I have a yellow lab mix rescue that sheds like crazy. If you're a dog person you accept shedding as part of having/loving a dog. As part of our normal routine I brush him out after our three mile walk every morning. He accepts it as normal like getting his feet cleaned before we go in the house. I get a handful or more with the tool every day rather than sucking up dust bunnies off the floor with the vacuum. If you brush routinely it really does cut back on shedding.
customer_reviews.author: Gramps

customer_reviews.title: Snookered by reviews
customer_reviews.text: I bought the brush based on reviews. However, it removed very little hair on my Brittany, where a furminator removes a ton every swipe. My puppy will sneeze and leave more hair behind than this comb removed. You also have to use your fingers to remove the tiny bit of fur it captures. Do not recommend. I always looked at reviews, but missed that this time all the 5 stars were occurring on the same day.
customer_reviews.author: iThinkYou'reFunny

customer_reviews.title: Best pet brush I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews on these types of brushes and even though I was skeptical on the metal rake, I thought I would give it a try. And I was immediately glad I did! My cats love the brush and it pulls out so much of the loose undercoat! This is by far the best pet brush I have ever owned. Come spring and summer, when my cats shed the most, using this brush once or twice a week really cuts down on the loose hair around the house. And people don't come back with a hairy mitten after petting the cats! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tim J Hanzlik

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: I have a Yorkie mix and he sheds like crazy so I bought this around the spring time because that is his shedding schedule and we've been having hairs all over the house none stop. I expected to collect a huge hairball since he sheds SO much and the pictures showed a lot of hair removed from their dogs. But barely anything comes out when I use the brush on my dog. Multiple people have tried it on him and it doesn't make a difference at all, I wish I could get my money back. Update: I was able to return it and got a refund! Do not keep this if it doesn’t work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole8

customer_reviews.title: For a shed-aphobe like myself- this is a great tool to keep cat hair shedding  from getting crazy!
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for my new cat. I’ve never wanted a shedding animal in my house- which is why I have a hypoallergenic dog. But after much pleading my kids won and we adopted them a cat during this quarantine to bring a little joy their way. The shedding isn’t horrible but it’s not what I’m used to so I’m trying to keep it to a minimum. This brush brings out the undercoat and seems to pull out a lot of loose hair. She’s still getting used to it so I’m trying a little at a time. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Laura McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: The furminator was recommended by a friend, but I came across this brush on Amazon for a way better price! The reviews were great and I thought why not give it a try before I spent so much on the furminator. IT'S AWESOME!! I have a German Shepherd and this is her first time shedding a winter coat, and OMG can you say haaaaiiiirrrr!😣 One good brush out with this brush and the difference is AMAZING! Thanks for making and selling this brush at a reasonable price, and with a LIFETIME GUARANTEE!👌
customer_reviews.author: Christina Cruse

customer_reviews.title: Border Collie Approved!
customer_reviews.text: We have a border collie that loses a ton of long hair. This tool is great for removing long hair. I am always amazed by how much hair this thing manages to comb off. Only issues is that you have to clean out the fur with each stroke or it won’t work. The hair has to be knot free or it can pull the dogs hair. Must be careful not to push too hard because it can pull the hair and hurt. Wish the comb was a little bigger to cover more area. A little time consuming but it works very well!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as Furminator
customer_reviews.text: I had an original Furminator- which I destroyed by running over with a lawn mower :(. I bought this as a cheaper replacement based on good reviews- but it doesn't seem to brush my lab's hair as well as the furminator- and there isn't a hair release function which is helpful (especially because I was used to it from the furminator.) Overall, this just doesn't seem to remove hair as well as furminator, and quality seems cheap. If this gets run over with the lawnmower- I will definitely go back to a real "Furminator".
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE DOG BRUSH YOU ARE LOOKING FOR - BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: This is the dog brush you need. I have a German Shepherd, and will always have a German Shepherd. I have tried every dog brush invented throughout the last 20 years, and even tried brushes made for other animals, until I was referred to this brand from a dog groomer. I have wasted hours brushing the back legs, only to feel like the job wasn't completed until I got the Pet Neat Pet Brush! I purchased this in 2017 and still raving about it three years later. Very good brush. Buy It!
customer_reviews.author: El Guapo

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: We have a furminator, but the handle has broke, it has worked great for 11 years. Decided to give this a try and it’s a complete waste. Hardly pulls any of the loose hair off our frenchie and pug. Not worth my time to ship back, so I’ll just leave a review.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R. Hammonds

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I am going the say this first I was already super ocd of brushing my cat. So I wasn't sure what to expect going into this. Will I get a lot of because I already brush my cat. Lets just say I was surprised to say the least. I literally go off enough hair to make two other kittens. This product works and I have also noticed the add benefit of him less cleaning himself because he isn't worrying about getting the dead fur off of him. So Thanks for the great product. I will be using this brush weekly
customer_reviews.author: Magnus Whiteraven

customer_reviews.title: Wow wow wow
customer_reviews.text: After seeing the reviews I supposed that the people were working for the company and had exageratted the amount of hair this brush gets out of your dog. I have an 80 lbs boxer shepherd cross with mostly short hair but has a thicker coat around his neck. When I started combing him with this grooming brush, I was amazed how much hair came out of his coat. The short hair thinned out tremendously and the longer coat around his neck lost about half its thickness. It was so much I wondered if I needed to adjust his collar smaller. He looks cleaner and sleeker after using this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Kolby Wolfley

customer_reviews.title: An effective tool for cat grooming
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly and it goes easy on the skin of my cat. FYI she has a very little tolerance for grooming. And she can stand to have me brush her hair for a couple of minutes before I turn her crazy. So far this is my best personal record. It can get the job done. The metal part of this brush is solid, the plastic handle is easy to grip. But the catch latch mechanism seems on the fragile side, and that’s an area for product improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Great brush for the price - It Works.
customer_reviews.text: I had originally purchased one of the "well advertised" pet brushes. It worked great but the blade seems to dull quickly. When I looked for a replacement blade, the price was almost the same as a new brush. I found this brush, great price and good reviews. I have had it almost 3 years now. It is still as sharp as it was the first time I used it. I use this primarily on my Maine Coon cats. They seem to love it and it is great for removing that undercoat that is so hot on them in the summer. I highly recommend this brush.
customer_reviews.author: D. Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good brush. It works just as well as the original Furminator that we bought several years ago. We had to replace the old brush because some of the teeth eventually broke on it, making it dangerous to use. So far this one is holding up well on our 150 lb dog.
customer_reviews.author: J. Canan

customer_reviews.title: Works so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Tried it out for the first time tonight and it worked. My dog sheds and I’m tired of so much dog hair all over so thought I give this a try. Got a good amount of hair off and I only did a quick brush. It has a nice handle and is easy to hold. My dog didn’t seem to mind at all either.
customer_reviews.author: B

product_meta.title: Pet Grooming Brush Effectively Reduces Shedding by Up to 95% Professional Deshedding Tool for Dogs and Cats
product_meta.description:
Put An End To Your Pet’s Shedding Fast, Easily & Safely With A Stunning Deshedding Brush!

Tired of your puppy’s loose hair spoiling your furniture, floors and carpets?

Sick of the thick layer of cat hair on all your clothes?

Well, this is the end of an era!

We are offering you a high-end dog and cat deshedding tool to make your pet grooming more efficient, effortless and effective from the convenience of your home!

Pro Deshedding Services For Healthy, Happy Pets!

No more worries about persistent tangles and loose pet dead hair floating in the air!

We are making removing burrs, leaves and weeds off your dog’s coat a one-handed operation, thanks to the premium grooming equipment for SHORT, MEDIUM or LONG pet hair!

Mats will stop building into a grooming headache and removing undercoat and loose dog or cat hair will only take 10 minutes, leaving your doggy waggling its tail and your kitty purring happily!

Your Pet’s Health Is Our Top Notch!

Gently stroke their hair, directing the STAINLESS STEEL teeth of the STURDY BLADE towards the coat!

Offer your puppy or kitten DELUXE grooming services from head to paws, keeping their coat and fur healthy and shiny and stop excessive shedding while helping them relax!

The STRONG, ERGONOMIC HANDLE promise precision & convenience without falling off or breaking for years and years!

A Stunning FREE Bonus!

Get 1000+1 tips on treating your pet like royalty in the ‘Four Dog Care E-Book’ offered absolutely FREE of charge with your order!

Great Gifting Idea!

Offer this heavy-use dog and cat deshedding brush to all pet owners to make their pet grooming ritual a breeze!

Waste No More Time & Get Yours NOW!

Click To Add To Cart While Supplies Last!
feature_bullets: Best pet grooming tool! Leave behind the grooming headache, removing up to 95% of dead hair and tangles from your cat and dog easily IN JUST 10 MINUTES! Keep your furniture and floors free of pet hair while SAVING MONEY and TIME on expensive visits to the vet for pet grooming services! Get valuable grooming tips on the ‘Four Dog Care’ FREE E-book!

A durable shedding tool! This dog and cat comb is MADE TO LAST through long years of effortless pet grooming! With the 100mm STAINLESS STEEL BLADE protected by a cover for your safety and the blade longevity and the STURDY, EASY-GRIP HANDLE, it promise top precision. It is a long-lasting deshedding tool, a MUST-HAVE pet hair remover!

Healthy, shiny pet coat! Rid your four-legged friend of undercoat and loose hair effortlessly, and keep at bay allergies by frequently brushing them! Have your pet thankful for the professional services of a dog/cat deshedding tool and establish strong bonds between you and your four-legged friend!

TA Thoughtful gift to all pet owners! Easy to use and causing not a speck of discomfort, this grooming brush will put a wide smile on the face of the lucky pet owner! It will relieve their dog or cat from shedding, trimming pet grooming time to just 10 minutes. Offer it on all occasions to save them time, money and effort and show off your excellent taste!
100% SATISFACTION: All Pet Neat products are satisfaction for life. Click Add to Cart now!

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
